root.item:
Eliason 1031 Properties, one of the nation's premier TIC Sponsors, is pleased to offer the 358-unit Summer Park apartment community.

Located in northeast suburban Atlanta, this Class A property was developed in 2001 by a premier multi-family developer and boasts an attractive Mall of Georgia address in Gwinnett County.

Address: 1525 Laurel Crossing Parkway
Buford, Gwinnett County, GA 30519

# Units: 358
# 1 BR: 112
# 2 BR: 206
# 3 BR: 40

Avg. Unit Size: 1,057 square feet
Net Rentable Area: 378,546 square feet
Land Area: 39.267 acres
Parking: 714 spaces including 654 open spaces and 44 detached garages
Occupancy: 95.6%

Residents are attracted to Summer Park's private wooded setting, which provides the feel of an exclusive resort.

  • Park-like Wooded Site with Extraordinary Landscaping
  • Controlled Access Gates
  • Clubhouse with Rear Veranda
  • Professional Business Center
  • Stunning Swimming Pool with Spacious Sundeck
  • Fully-Equipped Fitness Center
  • Lighted Tennis Courts
  • Tanning Bed
  • Picnic Areas w/Grills
  • Playground

• Gorgeous private wooded site located near Interstate 85 and Highway 20
  • Excellent access to the Mall of Georgia while allowing residents to avoid heavy mall traffic
  • Direct access to Interstate 985 to the north and Highway 316 to the south
  • 15 minutes from Lake Lanier and 40 minutes from the University of Georgia in Athens

Population Growth

  • Ranked one of the top five youngest and fastest growing counties in the country
  • Population has grown 289% since 1980 to more than 650,000
  • Projected to hit 1.2 million by 2025
  • Most of Atlanta's growth is attributable to Gwinnett

Employment/Economic Growth

  • Employment base has more than doubled since 1990
  • Established high-tech center home to CIBA Vision, Primerica, NCR, Unisys
  • $90 million Arena at Gwinnett Center opened in 1993
  • Massive retail development driven by population growth

Metro Atlanta has become the economic engine of the Southeast and one of the most dynamic economic bases in the country.

  • "Hottest Economy in the Country" Inc. Magazine, 2004
  • "4 th Best Place to Do Business" Forbes, 2003
  • Home to many corporate headquarters including UPS and Home Depot

Population and Economic Growth

  • Population stands at 3.7 million and is projected to reach 4.8 million by 2010, a 30% increase
  • Economy continues to be a national leader
  • Projected job growth is over 110,000 from 2005-2006
  • Biotech sector has grown 150% over the last decade

Summer Park is located close to prime retail development anchored by the 2.1 million square foot Mall of Georgia.

  • Largest retail center in the Southeast
  • Home to upscale retailers such as Nordstrom, Ann Taylor and Williams-Sonoma
  • Draws visitors from as far away as South Carolina
  • Total retail development in the area totals more than 3 million square feet

This offering has the added benefit of being covered by a 10-year master lease through Eliason Master Lease Corporation (EML). This arrangement gives the investor a level of security, comfort and convenience other TIC's don't offer.

  • Investors receive monthly contracted payments for 10 years
  • EML pools leases from many diverse properties to provide extra security and stability
  • Even if a property experiences a short-term deficit, EML still pays the investors the full contracted cash payment
  • EML manages and pays for all repairs, maintenance and capital improvements

• Sales Price: $37.65 million
  • Equity Raise: $15.00 million
  • Debt: $22.65 million
  • Loan-to-Purchase Price: 60.16%
  • Minimum Investment: $450,000
  • $2,000 set-up charge per investor. All other transaction fees and expenses paid by Eliason 1031 Properties.

To learn more about this extraordinary property or to invest or conduct a 1031 Exchange into Summer Park, please contact your local investment representative.

Eliason 1031 Properties Corporation
548 Hwy 155
P.O. Box 219
St. Germain, WI 54558
Phone: 1-866-ELIASON
Fax: 715-479-5434
